physical_appearance:\The image shows a digital print
 an artist\u0027s proof
 and a slide. They are rectangular in shape. The background of the digital print and artist\u0027s proof are blue in colour. The background of the photograph shows the structure of a flight of stairs in a zig-zag orientation. The flight of stairs has red railings. A construction worker is depicted to be ascending the flight of stairs. He adorns a yellow helmet and carries a red pail. The image at the bottom shows a slide. It is in colour. It is held in place by a frame. On the borders of the frame
 \\Z No. 1\\ is stated at the top for the image at the bottom \\Tan Lip Seng
